Kokoro

Hometown:

Saitama, Japan

코코로

17 years old
Group (2024-present):
UN1CON

Introduction

Kokoro is a member of the upcoming Japanese girl group UN1CON, based in Korea and produced by Roydo. The group lineup includes Manami, Joa, Kokoro, Akari, and Narae. UN1CON is set to make its debut in October 2024.
